block.p: Mr. and Mrs. James R. Simpson of Houston have announced the engagement of Mr. Simpson's daughter Elizabeth Bartlett Simpson to Alfred A. La Fountain 3d, a son of Mr. and Mrs. La Fountain Jr. of Medford, N.J. A May wedding is planned.

Ms. Simpson, who is 36, is known as Tica. She was until recently an English and history teacher at the Heathwood Hall Episcopal School in Columbia, S.C. She graduated from Smith College and received a master's degree in English education from New York University.

Mr. and Mrs. James R. Simpson of Houston have announced the engagement of Mr. Simpson's daughter Elizabeth Bartlett Simpson to Alfred A. La Fountain 3d, a son of Mr. and Mrs. La Fountain Jr. of Medford, N.J. A May wedding is planned.

Ms. Simpson, who is 36, is known as Tica. She was until recently an English and history teacher at the Heathwood Hall Episcopal School in Columbia, S.C. She graduated from Smith College and received a master's degree in English education from New York University.

Her father, who is retired, was the vice president of the international division of the Occidental Chemical Corporation in Houston. Ms. Simpson is a daughter of the late Elizabeth B. Simpson and a stepdaughter of Clarice Simpson, a travel photographer in Houston.

Mr. La Fountain, 42, is known as Tad. He owns the La Fountain Research Corporation, an operator of on-line data services in Princeton, N.J. He graduated from Princeton University and received an M.B.A. from the University of Pennsylvania. His father is a project manager at Roland Aristone Inc., a construction company in Medford.
